cause.description:
Most people have no idea what it feels like to wake up every morning and think "I'm going to skate today, I wonder if the cops will try to arrest me for skating or if some asshole will say something dumb about skating to me?" If you believe that skaters should be able to skate freely with no worries then join this cause.
1. Freedom to do what you want.
2. Freedom to skate without abuse.
cause.name: Skateboarding is NOT a crime
